subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Annika Sorenstam of Sweden shot a two-under-par 70 Sunday to win the Dubai Ladies Masters by two strokes and collect her first victory since she won here in 2006.“I am so happy to have finally won again,” said Sorenstam, who finished at 10-under 278 at the season-ending tournament of the Ladies European Tour. The third-round leader, Iben Tinning of Denmark, had a double bogey at the last hole and finished with a 73, tying for second with Laura Davies of England, who shot a 72.
